title: Blended Mojitos
directions: Layer mint leaves, lime juice, rum, sugar, and ice in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour drink into two 16-ounce glasses and top each with seltzer water. Place a lime wedge on each glass and add a fresh mint sprig to each.
ingredients: 4 fluid ounces lemon-flavored rum (such as Bacardi Limon Citrus)
2 cups ice, or more if desired
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lime-flavored seltzer water
